TopicTitle: Advice/Suggestions For a Joystick and Headset

Articles.Content: I'm building a new PC sometime in January and I'm looking for some advice and suggestions about some items I want to get for it. The sort of items I am looking for is a budget joystick that works or would work well with KSP, Arma II, Far Cry 4, Space Engineers and GTAV. Thats if GTA and Far Cry will support them, ignore them if they dont. I am also looking for a decent budget headset with a microphone. Thanks in advance.
